thread.title: Hands-on with the Canon EOS 77D:
thread.title_full: Hands-on with the Canon EOS 77D: Digital Photography Review

author: Barney Britton
title: Hands-on with the Canon EOS 77D:
text: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Hands-on with the Canon EOS 77D The new EOS 77D (EOS 9000D in some regions) slots in-between the Rebel T7i (EOS 800D) and the EOS 80D, and incorporates a lot of the same features as the latter at a lower price-point: $900 body-only compared to $1100. Based around the same 24MP sensor, the 77D also features the same 45-point AF system, but incorporates an updated Digic 7 processor (compared to Digic 6 in the 80D).
